name: D-A-R-T
description:
The Deep Space Armed Response Team is recruiting pilots to join their ranks, can you make the cut?

Battle your way through 15 mission and unlock over a dozen unique ships

Upgrade your skills with each weapon system to inflict maximum damage!

Keep the space lanes clear of pirates, aliens, robots and whatever else may be out there, only you can prevent space piracy!

Enlist right away and help make space safe again!

All funds raised will go to continued development!
